newsitem.title: USA: Litchfield Financial adds $25 mln credit.
newsitem.headline: Litchfield Financial adds $25 mln credit.

text.p: Litchfield Financial Corp said on Tuesday it completed a $25 million credit and loan sale facility with BankBoston Corp's commercial paper conduit, EagleFunding Capital Corp, to provide funding for Litchfield's vacation ownership interest loans.

Litchfield specializes in financing the purchase of rural and vacation properties and timeshares. It said its cost of timeshare sales would be lowered by about 200 basis points by the new credit facility.
